product.title: Every Day I Spend With You is a Gift Camp Flag • Kelle Hampton x Oxford Pennant
product.description: This item is part of a collaboration with Kelle Hampton, a New York Times Bestselling Author. Kelle’s book, Bloom, is a story about her relationship with her daughter Nella, who was born with Down syndrome. A portion of all proceeds benefit Ruby’s Rainbow, a charity who supports adults with Down syndrome seeking higher education. Size: 18" x 24" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design Color: Navy body, Gold, Cream and Blue details
product.descriptionHtml:
This item is part of a collaboration with Kelle Hampton, a New York Times Bestselling Author. Kelle’s book, Bloom, is a story about her relationship with her daughter Nella, who was born with Down syndrome.  A portion of all proceeds benefit Ruby’s Rainbow, a charity who supports adults with Down syndrome seeking higher education. 

Size: 18" x 24" 

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design

Color: Navy body, Gold, Cream and Blue details
